page.title: 02Tamar Valley _ Lifestyle (1)
page.content: Domestic life is of two kinds: (1) The long established family, who have been{farming}or market gardening the same land for generations.{Life {styles}for these people are slow to change, with the daily farming routine observed all the year round. Many farms and cottages still rely on spring water for their only supply, but elecicity is available to all properties, either through mains supply or private generator. This has made milking easier and also provided television for occasional relaxation. {Communication}with the outside world would be confined to weekly excursions to the nearest shops (some 6 or 8 miles). There is no public transport here however. {Attitudes}are contentedly parochial. A broad westcountry dialect is spoken, and self-sufficiency is the the aim.
